name: DailyTidbits
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily tidbits
des:
Ask for Daily Tidbits, and learn about some of the most interesting topics in science.

Daily Tidbits provides quality facts for anyone to learn and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Daily Tidbits" to start learning.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, exit"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
